pageContent:
DURGA THAMMINENI MAHENDRA CHINNA 
Atlanta, Georgia | dthamminenimah@gmail.com | (424)-567-9991│LinkedIn 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY  
Highly motivated Data Analyst enthusiast with over 6 years of experience in Procurement Services, Supply Chain Operations, 
Business Analysis, and Contract Management. Proven track record in managing projects and developing predictive models that drive 
business growth and efficiency. Renowned for effective communication and collaboration skills, with a keen eye for trend 
identification and intuitive business value decisions. 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
 
Topsys IT Solutions, LLC., USA             July 2023 – Present 
Business Analyst / Data Analyst   
• Gathering, reviewing, and analyzing business and industry data, including KPIs, and financial reports, using data analytics tools. 
• Assessing options for process improvement, including business process modeling, and maintaining documentation regarding various 
projects, processes, and operations.

• Assessing options for process improvement, including business process modeling, and maintaining documentation regarding various 
projects, processes, and operations. 
 
La Tienda, USA                                           Apr 2023 – May 2023 
Student Business Analyst (Capstone Project Scope To Improve Customer Retention And Satisfaction).   
● Executed a detailed project within a stringent 2-week timeframe, delivering data-driven business solutions and predictive models. 
● Designed an innovative survey model in Tableau that analyzed unique keywords from customer reviews, enabling timely responses to 
feedback and potentially boosting customer retention by 10%. 
● Leveraged geographic trends and priority selling items to deliver business solutions via predictive data modeling. 
● Achieved top-tier accuracy in the data model for predicting second-purchase customer retention.

● Achieved top-tier accuracy in the data model for predicting second-purchase customer retention. 
● Employed time series analysis techniques using SQL and Python to forecast trends, subsequently visualizing these insights in Tableau 
for strategic business planning. 
 
 
Wells Fargo, India                                              Dec 2018 – Jul 2022 
Contract Analyst-II & Strategic Sourcing Associate 
 
● Spearheaded negotiations resulting in savings of approximately $500,000 on 5 contracts in Q1 2022, cutting budget costs by 50%. 
● Implemented a shared folder channel & automated follow-up process, reducing contract lifecycle by 30% & enhancing productivity. 
● Conducted a comprehensive gap analysis on vendor services, leading to a profit margin increase of 5% to 10% through improved 
vendor outcomes. 
● Streamlined deployment processes and automated the Request for Proposal (RFP) procedure, consistently meeting target-driven 
deadlines and boosting operational efficiency.

vendor outcomes. 
● Streamlined deployment processes and automated the Request for Proposal (RFP) procedure, consistently meeting target-driven 
deadlines and boosting operational efficiency. 
● Attained one of the top supply chain procurement department ratings for savings.  
● Promoted within 9 months of tenure based on leadership skills and a consistent track record. 
 
Denisco Chemicals, India                                                                                                Dec 2012 – May 2015                                        
Quality Analyst    
● Conducted quantitative analysis research, acceptance testing, and quality checks with 90% accuracy. 
● Utilized flow charts in Visio to strategize operational functions, improve processes, and ensure data integrity by around 10%. 
● Identified discrepancies in the inventory directory and methods, enhancing quality and consistency.
